SEARCH
Package util

Class UIUtils

java.lang.Object
util.UIUtils
public class UIUtils extends Object
The UIUtils class provides static methods to handle various user interface tasks, such as displaying messages, collecting input, and validating data formats.

    • displayHeader

      public static void displayHeader(String title)
      Displays a formatted header with a given title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title to display in the header.

    • displayError

      Parameters:
      message - the error message to display.

    • displaySuccess

      public static void displaySuccess(String message)
      Displays a success message.
      Parameters:
      message - the success message to display.

    • promptForString

      public static String promptForString(String message)
      Prompts the user for a string input.
      Parameters:
      message - the prompt message to display.
      Returns:
      the user's input as a trimmed string.

    • promptForDateTime

      public static LocalDateTime promptForDateTime(String message)
      Prompts the user for a date-time input in the format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm". Validates that the input is in the correct format and is a future date.
      Parameters:
      message - the prompt message to display.
      Returns:
      the user's input as a LocalDateTime.

    • promptForInt

      public static int promptForInt(String message, int min, int max)
      Prompts the user for an integer input within a specified range. Validates that the input is a number and falls within the range.
      Parameters:
      message - the prompt message to display.
      min - the minimum acceptable value.
      max - the maximum acceptable value.
      Returns:
      the user's input as an integer.

    • promptForYesNo

      public static boolean promptForYesNo(String message)
      Prompts the user for a yes/no input.
      Parameters:
      message - the prompt message to display.
      Returns:
      true if the user enters "Y", false if the user enters "N".

    • pressEnterToContinue

      public static void pressEnterToContinue()
      Prompts the user to press Enter to continue. Waits for the user to press Enter before proceeding.

    • formatDateTime

      public static String formatDateTime(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Formats a LocalDateTime object into a string using the "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm" format.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - the LocalDateTime to format.
      Returns:
      the formatted date-time string.
